name: To Descend
description:
Hello everyone. This is the first game I've ever completed and my first time participating in a Ludum Dare Jam! This was a solo project and I've only been working with Unity for a week. I am also not a programmer. So this was a very difficult, but eventually satisfying experience.

The game is called To Descend. The player will have to help Jess as she tries to find her way out of a disturbing situation, and a smelly one at that. Use W,A,S,D to move and space to fight. Please do not skip the dialogue!

Sound: Motion Array, Fesliyan Studios

Web Version: https://simmer.io/@ToeKnee/to-descend
